attributes.action: initiate (and ensure completion before the next General Election of) the necessary administrative, executive, judicial, legislative, military and prerogative measures to ensure the abolition of the monarchy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is high time that Great Britain moved into the modern age.
It is the monarchy above all that makes Britain the laughing-stock of the world.
It is the use of the monarchy's military rank and prerogative powers by unelected establishment interests that lies behind the most dishonourable and criminal acts that are committed in Britain's name.
The devolution of the rank of Head of State onto the Speaker of the House of Commons will ensure that public debate about what else -if anything- should replace the monarchy is conducted separately and is not allowed to fudge the debate about abolition of the monarchy.
